Description: Fragment of neck and oval handle of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine, dirty. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, '3̣5̣'. Name Archibios. From the same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0095.43 and an example from Paphos.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (87)
